topic.title: EMS Current Medication Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="67844-1" EMS Current Medications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67791-4" Currently on medication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry Contains zero or more [0..*] value with data type BL
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "False" If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69749-0" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry Contains zero or more [0..*] value with data type BL
If EHistory.12 has the value "No anticoagulants," the value is False

Contains at least one [1..*] entry
Such entrys Contains zero or one [0..1] @negationInd
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "True" This negation of a notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"
Such entrys Contains zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor
If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in SubstanceAdministration.text. This nulled notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"
Such entrys Contains zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.13, EHistory.14
Such entrys SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CurrentMedicationAdministrationRoute 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.17 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EMedication.15
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSCurrentMedicationConsumable
This eMSCurrentMedicationConsumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode
This realmCode Contains exactly one [1..1] eMSCurrentMedicationDrug
This eMSCurrentMedicationDrug SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm)
SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="67844-1" EMS Current Medications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DRIV"
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived CDA Section Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.24)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67791-4" Currently on medication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry Contains zero or more [0..*] value with data type BL
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "False" If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69749-0" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry Contains zero or more [0..*] value with data type BL
If EHistory.12 has the value "No anticoagulants," the value is False

Contains at least one [1..*] entry
Such entrys Contains zero or one [0..1] @negationInd
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "True" This negation of a notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"
Such entrys Contains zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor
If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in SubstanceAdministration.text. This nulled notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"
Such entrys Contains zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.13, EHistory.14
Such entrys SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CurrentMedicationAdministrationRoute 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.17 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EMedication.15
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSCurrentMedicationConsumable
This eMSCurrentMedicationConsumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode
This realmCode Contains exactly one [1..1] eMSCurrentMedicationDrug
This eMSCurrentMedicationDrug SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm)
